Optiver Amsterdam

Low-latency Engineers | ONSITE | Visa Sponsorship | C++, Python, Linux

Software built for market making on electronic markets needs to be simple, fast, reliable and controllable. With the help of our engineers, researchers and traders our systems and algorithms are consistently evolving. We like to be ahead of the curve; actually – it’s the only way to survive in this competitive business.
